Html:
Hi,

I am trying to send about 2-3 lines (landscape A4) worth of text in the header using setOddHeader(). It is giving an error when I try to open the xlsx file ("Excel found unreadable content in ..."). In the end, it removes the header but I can still see the worksheet. The header is missing though. It works fine if there's less data sent in the header.

Is there a way around this? It's quite essential that I can send that amount of data in the header.

Regards,
N9ne
How long is the header text you specified? Which data is in it?
